message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CV. 

The paper proposes a system for passage-based question-answering (QA) and focuses on training evidence agents to select the most convincing passage sentences for a given answer. This falls under the sub-category of natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning (ML), which are covered by cs.CL, cs.AI, and cs.LG. The paper also discusses the use of QA models and their ability to generalize to longer passages and harder questions, which relates to information retrieval (IR) and computer vision (CV), covered by cs.IR and cs.CV. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.CL, cs.AI, and cs.LG, followed by cs.IR and cs.CV.
